name: akepalos.github.io
short_description: A website created just for fun.
description:
‣ About the Project

First and foremost, I just made this website for fun. This was inspired from a deep web myth I saw while browsing on the internet.

‣ Description

Below are the screensots of the website itself.



As can be seen above, the whole website has a very simplistic and minimalist design. It only contains two anchor links; which are (1) the death date and time calculator and (2) the tarot consultation.

The death date and time calculator generates a date based on the letters of the input name. Meanwhile, the tarot consultation randomly shows tarot card.

name: OTG-Nilboard
short_description: Android smartphone app to suppress the default keyboard.
description:
‣ About the App

This project is exclusively for Android smartphones only. I made this keyboard app that does nothing so that bluetooth and OTG physical keyboard users would be able to hide the Android phone's on-screen keyboard.
This keyboard literally does nothing and is purposively made for bluetooth and/or OTG keyboard users as mentioned previously.


‣ Download
otg-nilboard.apk

Unsigned APK file for Android devices. (Only tested on Android 9 to 11)

otg-nilboard-source.zip

OTG-Nilboard's complete little complete code base compressed in a zip file.

name: Lanzaplicación
short_description: Android launcher with a super minimalist and primitive-looking UI.
description:
‣ About the App

This Android launcher is a super minimalist and primitive-looking UI made without any other intent. I made this app purely just for fun.

‣ Download
lanzaplicacion.apk

Unsigned APK file for Android devices.

lanzaplicacion-source.zip

Lanzaplicación's complete little complete code base compressed in a zip file.

name: Nougat Programming Language
short_description: General-purpose dynamic scripting and programming language.
description:
‣ About the Language

Nougat programming language is a general-purpose dynamic scripting and programming language. Nougat is a high-level language and is compiled just-in-time. This programming language is specially designed for coding dynamicism.

Strictly designed with so much powerful expressiveness in writing programs and/or code, Nougat is also designed for amateurs. With little complexity, oneself can learn Nougat easily.

Nougat programming language's now out! After almost four months of development full of discontinuities. Check it out here at: https://nougat.neocities.org/.

name: La Pregunta
short_description: A very short multi-platform visual novel game.
description:
‣ About the Project

The storyline of this visual novel is just a re-written and modified version of "The Question" by Ren'py. However, this project is a manually-coded one. Also, the character designs are made by sutemo, check them out here at sutemo.itch.io.
The visual novel is currently available on Android and Windows devices. Download links below.

‣ Download
la-pregunta.apkAndroid APK (tested on Android 9 and above).
La-Pregunta.msiWindows Microsoft installer/set-up (32-bit)
